Amulet Seller Shafa:
Welcome, ye who follow the cry fo fire! I am Shafa, daughter of Pa'agrio! What is your business with me? Speak up! Do you seek the power of a bear? Or perhaps the patience of a hunting spider? Would you like to run like a wolf, faster than the wind? Amulets can bring you all of these things!
물건 구매
영주 및 세율 정보를 본다
